sn3.24:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn3.24:1.6: “Aññaṁ kho etaṁ, mahārāja, kattha dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, aññaṁ panetaṁ kattha dinnaṁ mahapphalanti?
sn3.24:1.7: Sīlavato kho, mahārāja, dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, no tathā dussīle.
sn3.24:1.8: Tena hi, mahārāja, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi. Yathā, te khameyya, tathā naṁ byākareyyāsi.
sn3.24:1.10: idha tyassa yuddhaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ saṅgāmo samupabyūḷho.
sn3.24:1.11: Atha āgaccheyya khattiyakumāro asikkhito akatahattho akatayoggo akatūpāsano bhīru chambhī utrāsī palāyī.
sn3.24:1.12: Bhareyyāsi taṁ purisaṁ, attho ca te tādisena purisenā”ti?
sn3.24:1.13: “Nāhaṁ, bhante, bhareyyaṁ taṁ purisaṁ, na ca me attho tādisena purisenā”ti.
sn3.24:1.17: na ca me attho tādisena purisenā”ti.

sn3.24:2.4: Bhareyyāsi taṁ purisaṁ, attho ca te tādisena purisenā”ti?
sn3.24:2.5: “Bhareyyāhaṁ, bhante, taṁ purisaṁ, attho ca me tādisena purisenā”ti.
sn3.24:2.8: atha āgaccheyya suddakumāro susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katūpāsano abhīru acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī.

sn3.24:2.10: “Bhareyyāhaṁ, bhante, taṁ purisaṁ, attho ca me tādisena purisenā”ti.
sn3.24:3.1: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yasmā kasmā cepi kulā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti, so ca hoti pañcaṅgavippahīno pañcaṅgasamannāgato, tasmiṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ hoti.
sn3.24:3.3: Kāmacchando pahīno hoti, byāpādo pahīno hoti, thinamiddhaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti, vicikicchā pahīnā hoti.
sn3.24:3.6: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena paññākkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti.
